thread.title: Nice hotel, with a small caveat....
thread.title_full: Nice hotel, with a small caveat.... - Review of Garden Elysee Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: STL_MO_Traveler
title: Nice hotel, with a small caveat....
text: My time at the Garden Elysee was shaping up to be excellent until two events coincided. I contracted some type of respiratory infection and the hotel was performing very noxious maintenance. The combination of the two made sleeping in my room impossible. I contacted the front desk, they found me a room on another floor not as affected by the fumes. The room was not completely free of fumes (they permeated the entire hotel) but I was able to get some sleep that evening with the windows open and the heater fan running constantly. I would love to stay here again, but I would be certain the renovations are completed. My original room facing the garden was much quieter than the temporary room I had facing the street.
